title: Vision Linens 100% Cotton Cellular Baby Pram Travel Cot Blanket, Small Size (90cm x 70cm / 35” x 28”), White, Super Soft, Easy Care, Machine Washable, Lightweight, 259 GSM, Leno Weave
features: SUPER SOFT: A lightweight 100% cotton leno weave cellular blanket for use with babies. It's super soft, keeping them cosy and warm when they're out and about in their pram or the baby is in their cot.
TWO SIZES: Small (90cm x 70cm / 35” x 28”) or large (170 x 120cm / 67” x 47”). Each blanket also features a GSM weight of 259. Shipped in a self-seal bag.
FOUR COLOURS: Choose from white, grey, pink or blue coloured blankets. Each colour continues to look its best, wash after wash, and look great in your baby's bedroom and nursery.
OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 CERTIFIED: Rigorously tested for harmful substances and has been certified as harmless for human health. You can be confident out products are ethically produced.
EASY CARE: All blankets are machine washable at 40° and they can be tumble dried on a low setting. You can also line dry them if you don’t own a dryer.
description: This beautifully soft cellular baby blanket is made from a 100% cotton leno weave that continues to look it’s best, wash after wash. It’s available in two sizes, small or large, and four colours; white, grey, pink and blue (small size is only available in white and grey). Ideal for cot, cot beds, prams and travel cots. It has a GSM weight of 259 and is packed in a self-seal bag. OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 certification, giving you the peace of mind that this blanket has been rigorously tested for harmful substances and is certified as harmless for human health. Size Details: Small size: Width: 70cm Length: 90cm Depth: 2cm Weight: 200g Large size: Width: 120cm Length: 170cm Depth: 2cm Weight: 590g Washing Instructions: Machine washable at 40° Tumble dry on a low setting
